commit message: Add a space after a 'throws' clause.

Only set the list adapter if it is not already set.

Should fix an IllegalStateException crash in unregisterDataSetObserver
in the Android framework. See http://crashes.to/s/ae44bec4d3a for
details.

Fix a crash constructing Player objects on API < 9.

The hashcode functions call String.getBytes(Charset charset), which
doesn't exist on Android API < 9 (anything below Gingerbread), and
throws an exception.

Check for API < 9, and fallback to String.getBytes('UTF-8'), and
String.getBytes() if that also fails.
Remove extraneous period in a comment.
